tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE health_insurance_policy_updates (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(255),
    updated_on TIMESTAMP,
    amendment_reason TEXT,
    term_changes JSON
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyUpdates (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 policy_number VARCHAR(50),
 update_date DATE,
 update_type VARCHAR(50),
 update_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Amendments (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 amendment_number VARCHAR(50),
 amendment_date DATE,
 policy_number VARCHAR(50),
 amendment_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TermChanges (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 change_number VARCHAR(50),
 policy_number VARCHAR(50),
 change_date DATE,
 change_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyTerms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(20),
    term_start_date DATE,
    term_end_date DATE,
    term_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE policy_amendments (
  amendment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  amendment_date DATE,
  amendment_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policy_updates(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE term_changes (
  change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  change_date DATE,
  change_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policy_updates(policy_id)
);
